response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and I aim to honor this valuation while ensuring a fair transaction for myself. To open our negotiation, I propose a price of $1,150,000 for the product. This offer allows us to work within a reasonable margin while still capturing the majority of the product's value. Should you have any questions or need further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 1150000}
